page.title: 07Community Policeman
page.content: The Bretch Hill Estate has a community policeman it is his job to try and prevent crime. He tries to do this by visting schools, youth clubs, and other community groups. He also helps to run an after school club. When on duty his time is spent riding and walking around the estate or dealing with its problems, except on the few occasions when he is needed elsewhere. He believes that prevention is the best cure for crime and so he likes to be seen on the streets and doing regular visits to places when they are empty, to check that all is well eg. schools. By being seen he hopes there will be less problems. Getting to know people helps him to be aware of what's going on in the area. Most people react well to his presence especially the pensioners. The 15 to 25 age group resent him most.
